name: Just Want To Eat
description:
In-game story: You as someone who is watching his favorite movie... Then while watching, you feel hungry, and want to eat something... But in the kitchen there is no food and you go out to buy food... But suddenly something is chasing you... What has happened?... = Control =
  • W,A,S,D = Player Moving;
  • Shift = Player Run; 
  • Mouse Motion = Player Look;
DOWNLOAD NOW! Available on Windows & Linux! = Support US! = If you like this game DOWNLOAD NOW! If you want to support the developers of this free game, Donate however you like... You donate it means you have given us the enthusiasm to make other cool games that are more than this game! ... Follow us on itch.io to get information from us! See you in the next game!
